mapper.select: SELECT ISBN, bookName, author, publishCompany, date_format(publishDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS publishDate, bookNum from bookClass where ISBN = #{ISBN}
SELECT ISBN, bookName, author, publishCompany, date_format(publishDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS publishDate, bookNum from bookClass ORDER BY ISBN
mapper.update: update bookClass SET bookName = #{bookName}, author = #{author}, publishCompany = #{publishCompany}, publishDate = #{publishDate}, bookNum = #{bookNum} where ISBN = #{ISBN}
